oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Freedom's Call
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Fundraising pamphlet advertising Highlander's civil rights and union organizing work. Includes photographs of workshops, amenities, and a list of prominent sponsors.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Adult education; Civil rights; Civic leaders; Community leadership; Leadership; Citizenship--Study and teaching; Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Voting; Cooperative schools; Discrimination; Segregation; Education, Rural; Visual education; Race discrimination; Nursery schools; Library; School integration; Civil rights movements
